lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Terms of Dome's proposed debt restructuring plan preclude the company from making an accurate estimate of future financing costs, which are used in the new accounting calculations, it said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The dramatic drop in energy prices in early 1986 reverses much of the progress the company has made in the two previous years," Dome chairman J.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "It merely reflects the realistic carrying value of the company's assets in today's economic environment, and the absolute need for reaching a timely agreement with our lenders on a debt restructuring plan to assure the company's continued existence," he added.
